bugs.summary: Assertion failure: cachedStyles[i]->EqualForCachedAnonymousContentStyle(*cs) (cached anonymous content styles should be identical to those we would compute normally), at /builds/worker/workspace/build/src/layout/base/nsCSSFrameConstructor.cpp:3954

Split `HTMLEditor::HandleDeleteNonCollapsedSelection()` to range computation part and modifying DOM tree part

Use ComputeSizeWithIntrinsicDimensions for iframe in nsSubDocumentFrame::ComputeSize()
Huge performance degradation on Firefox 79 when opening web pages
ToResultInvoke should also work with RefPtr/nsCOMPtr
Autohiding menu bar prevents web content from getting the keyup event for the Alt key
